description: Stage 1: Expand npm run lint glob to include packages/ directory
Stage 2: Remove client-portal from VERTICAL_PACKAGES (composition layer exemption, -39 violations)
Stage 2: Remove documents from VERTICAL_PACKAGES (L2 infrastructure reclassification, -38 violations)
Stage 3: Copy blocknoteUtils.ts from documents to core, add @blocknote/core dep + export map entry
Stage 3: Fix broken HTML escaping in codeBlock handler (.replace no-ops -> proper & < >)
Stage 3: Fix broken HTML escaping in default case handler
Stage 3: Sanitize language prop in codeBlock to prevent attribute injection
Stage 3: Replace documents blocknoteUtils.ts with re-export shim from core
Stage 3: Redirect all blocknoteUtils callers to @alga-psa/core/lib/blocknoteUtils (~7 files + test mocks)
Stage 4: Add batch avatar functions to media/avatarUtils with Promise.allSettled for parallel URL resolution
Stage 4: Delete documents/lib/entityImageService.ts duplicate, remove export map entry, update documents/index.ts
Stage 4: Redirect all entity image/avatar callers from @alga-psa/documents to @alga-psa/media (~10 files)
Stage 4: Add @alga-psa/media dependency to package.json of client-portal, clients, projects, tenancy, tickets; replace in tags
Stage 5: Add ALLOWED_PAIRS for integrations->clients (4) and integrations->scheduling (1) with justification comments
Stage 6: Move PrioritySelect, CategoryPicker from tickets to @alga-psa/ui
Stage 6: Move getAllBoards to @alga-psa/core/actions or @alga-psa/db/actions
Stage 6: Update integrations + surveys callers to import pickers from new locations
Stage 7: Move company sync adapters from billing to integrations package (2 violations)
Stage 7: Move TicketMaterialsCard to msp-composition/tickets (1 violation)
Stage 7: Move ProjectMaterialsDrawer + test to msp-composition/projects (2 violations)
Stage 7: Move TacticalRMM components to msp-composition/integrations (2 violations)
Stage 7: Move InboundTicketDefaultsForm to msp-composition/integrations if still violating after picker moves
Stage 8a: Move ClientTickets, ContactTickets, ClientAssets, ClientDetails, InteractionDetails to msp-composition/clients (~26 violations)
Stage 8a: Update server page.tsx files to import from @alga-psa/msp-composition/clients

Stage 8b: Move WorkItemDetailsDrawer, WorkItemDrawer, WorkItemPicker, AppointmentRequestsPanel, TechnicianDispatchDashboard, TimeEntryEditForm, TimeEntryProvider to msp-composition/scheduling (~18 violations)
Stage 8b: Update server page.tsx files to import from @alga-psa/msp-composition/scheduling
Stage 8c: Move ActivityDetailViewerDrawer, ProjectsSection, TicketsSection to msp-composition/workflows (~9 violations)
Stage 8c: Update server page.tsx files to import from @alga-psa/msp-composition/workflows
Stage 8d: Move Projects, ProjectQuickAdd, ProjectDetailsEdit to msp-composition/projects (~5 violations)
Stage 8d: Update server page.tsx files to import from @alga-psa/msp-composition/projects
Stage 8: Add all required dependencies to msp-composition package.json
Stage 9: Final lint verification — <=5 no-feature-to-feature violations remaining
Stage 9: Final build verification — npm run build passes
Stage 9: Final test verification — npx vitest run passes
Stage 9: Clean up dead code from moves and update stale_code_cleanup_plan.md
